name: Camera Essential
description1: It is a niche camera selling website with users and admin dashboard, CRUD operation, and user Authentication System.
description2: Users can place orders, purchase or delete orders, and review when logged in.
description3: Admin can manage all orders, add a new product, or delete products from the database and add a new admin.

name: Wild Venture
description1: It is a tourism-related website that makes travel safer and more fun.
description2: Users can log in using the Google login system. Users cannot place orders until they log in.
description3: After login users can place an order by clicking on the buy now button and delete orders by clicking the delete button on the My Order page.

name: Physical Therapy
description1: Consulting with patients to learn about their physical condition and symptoms.
description2: Diagnosing movement dysfunction and developing a treatment plan.
description3: Teaching patients how to properly use therapeutic exercise techniques.
